title: Shikei Shikkouchuu Datsugoku Shinkouchuu
original_name: 死刑執行中脱獄進行中 荒木飛呂彦短編集
sinopse:
1. Shikei Shikkouchuu Datsugoku Shinkouchuu (Under Execution, Under Jailbreak)
   2-3. Dolce: Die Hard The Cat (Dolce, and His Master.)
2. Kishibe Rohan wa Ugokanai - Episode 16: Zangeshitsu (Thus Spoke Kishibe Rohan. Episode 16: At a Confessional)
   5-7. Deadman's Q (Deadman's Questions)
